tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is very caring and friendly. . He also showed the X ray visuals,  the present status of all my tooth and he explains the necessity of the treatment and the treatment plan.During the treatment the comforting words in between really made me feel amazing . After finishing the treatment,  once again he showed the X ray visuals - what he did and how successfully he rectified the problem which makes me happy. In my experience, he is a well informed and Competent person. What I say I mean it . He made me so comfortable in each and every stage of his treatment.
I am privileged to have him as my dentist and I recommend to others also.  - Dr Umesh Samuel
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir 😊 we hope to serve you and your family in the best way possible!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Painful Teething,Broken Teeth,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: I am writing to express my utmost gratitude and appreciation for the phenomenal work of you both (Doctor Balaganesh and Doctor Haripriya) did on my teeth implant and root canal treatment at Swasthya Dental Clinic.Before coming to swasthya clinic, I had experienced bitter encounters with my previous dentist, leaving me feeling anxious and uncertain about future dental procedures. However, from the moment I stepped into swasthya dental clinic, I immediately felt a sense of comfort and reassurance. Your warm and welcoming demeanors, coupled with your professionalism, instantly put me at ease.The level of care and attention to detail exhibited throughout the entire treatment process was truly exceptional. You took the time to thoroughly explain each step, making sure I was fully informed and comfortable every step of the way. Your expertise and precision during the teeth implant and root canal procedures were truly commendable. I could sense your genuine commitment to providing the best possible outcome for your patients.I would also like to extend my gratitude to the entire team at Swasthya Dental Clinic. From the friendly receptionists to the diligent dental assistants, everyone played a vital role in making my experience at your clinic truly outstanding. Thanks to my friend Mr.Jithin for referring Swasthya Dental Clinic.Wishing you continued success and happiness in all your future endeavours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for scaling as it's almost 8 months since I did this. While I'm really satisfied with the way Doctor explained everything it was too expensive. I know what I wanted to do even before I visited the doctor, *** **** ************ **** ** ************ I'll not visit again for my dental issues again.
reply_text:
Firstly we are happy that you were satisfied with our explanation, 
and about you knowing your problem already, we doctors  cannot deal with patients with just their need it's our duty to completely screen the patient even if they come with their own diagnosis (mostly a Google driven one).
 
Regarding the payment , it is impossible for us to find what's your budget or what you have in mind, I can only charge for my quality of work and the type of instruments we use for the procedure as we don't compromise on the quality of treatment done.

200rs is the bear minimum we can charge for the consultation.
Thank you
